item.title: Mercurial Status Update
item.description:
This week in mercurial we all continued to make progress on our variousÂ  bfiles features.Â  I will let our This week in mercurial we all continued to make progress on our variousÂ  bfiles features.Â  I will let our speak for itself.

In our meeting we discussed:

  • How Anton, Wendy and I will releaseÂ  auto* features to the mailing list:Â  In three seperate patches, after we have verified that they work together and don’t explode too badly when merged
  • Alex discussed some of the details ofÂ  how to implement hg serve
  • Paul discussed how to approach bfilesify
  • Benjamin will be on vacation next week, so we won’t have a meet, but Benjamin expects to return to great progress on bfiles ðŸ™‚

The transcriptÂ  of the meeting can be found here

item.title: Thunderbird Status Update
item.description:
Progress is a bit slow in the Thunderbird camp this week. Zach is re-submitting his last patch after making the appropriateÂ refinementsÂ and MozMill tests.Wei Xian Woo submitted his first patch and tests this week. He has already begun working on his second bug…

View this week’s full status update here
